title: QA Engineer (Brazil)
description:
QA Engineer

BeyondRisk AI-6

Brazil (Remote)


QA Engineer

Help us ship bullet-proof AI at scale. BeyondRisk AI-6 is looking for a QA Engineer who can own the full testing lifecycle - manual, automated, and AI-assisted - to ensure every release of our AI platform is rock solid.


About the Role

You’ll design and execute test strategies across web UIs, APIs, and microservices. From writing Selenium/Cypress suites to poking REST endpoints with Postman, you’ll hunt bugs before our users ever see them. You’ll wire your tests into our CI/CD pipelines, flag/flunk bad builds, and partner with DevOps for zero-touch deployments.


QA Engineer

Location: Remote, Brazil


About BeyondRisk AI-6

BeyondRisk empowers organizations to rapidly design, build, and scale AI-driven solutions through our AI-6 platform. We seamlessly bring together smart agents, data, and automation so enterprises can solve their toughest challenges at speed. Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors - we’re expanding our core engineering team. If you’re passionate about building intuitive interfaces for cutting-edge AI, join us.


Key Responsibilities

  • Manual & Exploratory Testing: Create and maintain test plans, exploratory charters, and regression checklists.
  • Test Automation: Build end-to-end UI tests (Selenium or Cypress) and API tests (Postman/Newman or similar).
  • API & Integration Testing: Validate REST/GraphQL endpoints, data flows, and backend integrations.
  • Bug Tracking & Reporting: Reproduce, triage, and track defects in Jira ; verify fixes and prevent regressions.
  • CI/CD Quality Gates: Embed automated tests into Git-based pipelines; block faulty builds and surface metrics.
  • Scripting & Tooling: Write lightweight Bash or Python scripts to seed data, mock services, or extend frameworks.
  • Collaboration: Work hand-in-hand with developers, DevOps, and product managers to ship on a predictable rhythm.


You’ll Excel in This Role If You:

  • Know Testing Inside Out: Solid grounding in functional, regression, and integration testing methodologies.
  • Automate Relentlessly: Hands-on with Selenium, Cypress, Postman/Newman, or equivalent frameworks.
  • Speak API Fluently: Confident validating request/response payloads, headers, auth flows, and error handling.
  • Track & Triage Like a Pro: Comfortable creating clear, actionable Jira tickets that engineers love (and fear).
  • Think in Pipelines: Understand how QA fits into DevOps; you wire tests into CI and keep the build clean.
  • Code Just Enough: Bash/Python/TypeScript chops for crafting helpers, stubs, or data generators.
  • Bonus Points: Experience using LLMs or AI tools to auto-generate test cases, data, or scripts.


Why Join BeyondRisk

  • Compensation & Equity: Competitive salary + stock options.
  • High-Impact Role: Directly shape the user experience of a cutting-edge AI platform used by global enterprises.
  • Cutting-Edge AI Platform: Work on the frontend interfaces for a next-gen hyper-automation solution transforming enterprises.
  • Culture & Learning: A culture of continuous learning, technical excellence, and close collaboration between engineering and AI/ML teams.
  • Global Collaboration: Thrive in a dynamic, international environment, working closely with talented colleagues across the US, Europe, and Asia.
  • Fast-Paced Growth: Collaborate with a passionate team and a hands-on leadership group, backed by top Silicon Valley investors.
  • Long-Term Opportunity: Shape the future of AI – be at the forefront of enterprise innovation by building the technology that enables it.


Ready to Break Things (Before Users Do)?

Apply now with an up-to-date CV (PDF). Let’s build trustworthy AI together.

title: Software Engineer III
description:
What You'll Do


Avalara is an AI-first company. We expect every engineer, manager, and leader to actively leverage AI to enhance productivity, quality, innovation, and customer value. AI is embedded in our workflows, decision-making, and products — and success at Avalara requires embracing AI as an essential capability, not an optional tool. We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to lead in the updating of solutions used by some of our largest customers including national governments.


You will report directly to the senior manager of the department and you will bring expertise in architectural principles, system design best practices, driving the creation of platforms that address complex challenges and empower global organizations. You will demand a blend of technical leadership and hands-on execution.


  • This is a fully remote position; however, only candidates residing in Brazil will be accepted.


What Your Responsibilities Will Be


  • Contribute to hands-on software development: Participate in daily coding tasks, collaborating with teams to solve complex technical challenges, design scalable solutions, and contribute directly to the delivery of high-quality software;
  • Optimization Focus: Address performance, scalability, observability, and security challenges through design and optimization strategies;
  • Collaboration: Partner with product managers, UX designers, and team members to align technical solutions with our goals. Represent the team in architectural review boards;
  • Documentation: Create comprehensive technical documentation, including system diagrams, architectural decisions, and design patterns;
  • Risk Management: Find and address technical risks, ensuring long-term sustainability and understanding of team goals;
  • Leverage AI copilots, code generation tools, and assistants (e.g., GitHub Copilot, AmazonQ, ChatGPT) to improve coding efficiency, testing, documentation, and prototyping.
  • Continuously upskill in AI-related technologies applicable to daily work.



What You'll Need to be Successful


  • Experience: 3+ years in software development and architecture, with demonstrated expertise in building large-scale, distributed systems for enterprise environments;
  • Education: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field;
  • Proficiency in C# or Java;
  • Experience building, maintaining, and supporting foundational shared services supporting cloud-native applications;
  • Proficiency in RESTful APIs, OAuth, and secure authentication protocols;
  • Experience with streaming technologies such as Kafka and databases such as Postgres and MongoDB;
  • Hands-on experience with public cloud providers and DevOps tools (e.g., Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, and GCP).
  • Development Practices: Agile methodologies, TDD, and CI/CD pipelines;
  • Soft Skills: Experience approaching a problem from different angles, analyzing pros and cons of different solutions; Experience communicating updates and resolutions to customers and other partners, and an approach to driving innovation;
  • English Fluency: Fluent English is a requirement for this role.
  • Only resumes submitted in English will be considered.
  • #LI-Remote

title: Machine Learning Engineer (Floorplan-to-3D Automation)
description:
About Formify

Formify is building the future of digital manufacturing for interior spaces --- from online 3D configuration to ready-to-machine outputs for kitchens, closets, and bathrooms. As part of our roadmap, we're developing AI tools that convert floorplans into 3D layouts to accelerate design, quoting, and production workflows.


Your Role

We're seeking an AI/ML Engineer to lead the development of a system that can analyze floorplan images (PDFs, DWGs, etc.) and convert them into 3D geometry --- walls, doors, windows, and more --- ready for our CPQ engine. You'll develop core AI capabilities and work closely with our design automation and backend teams to bring intelligent layout recognition to life.


What You'll Do

  • Design and train deep learning models to extract spatial and semantic information from 2D floorplans (images or vector files).
  • Develop pipelines to convert detected geometry into structured 3D models (e.g., wall objects, door/window placement).
  • Work with vector data (DXF/DWG), PDFs, or raster images to detect key architectural features.
  • Collaborate with CAD and backend engineers to translate AI output into parametric geometry.
  • Optimize models for speed, accuracy, and usability in real-world production environments.
  • Create optimal cabinetry layouts and suggestions from data provided from designers.


Experience Levels

Mid-Level (3-6 years experience)

  • Strong experience with deep learning frameworks (PyTorch, TensorFlow) and vision models (YOLO, UNet, Detectron, etc.)
  • Experience in computer vision or document/image parsing
  • Understanding of geometry-based learning and spatial context
  • Ability to translate model output into geometric representations


Senior Level (6+ years experience)

  • Advanced expertise in geometry-based learning , OCR with spatial context , and complex vision systems
  • Proven ability to lead ML projects from conception to production
  • Experience with CAD/BIM environments, Rhino/Grasshopper, or geometry processing libraries (e.g., trimesh, Open3D)
  • Track record of deploying ML models in real-world manufacturing or design environments
  • Project leadership and team mentoring experience


Bonus Experience

  • Experience with CAD/BIM environments, Rhino/Grasshopper, or geometry processing libraries
  • Knowledge of architectural drawing standards and conventions
  • Experience in manufacturing or design automation industries


Why You'll Love This

  • You'll work at the bleeding edge of vision + design automation.
  • Your work will drastically reduce the time from inspiration to production in the interiors industry.
  • Join a cross-functional team where AI connects directly to real-world manufacturing.
  • Competitive compensation with opportunity to pioneer AI applications in manufacturing.

title: Senior Back-end Engineer (Python)
description:
We are Software Mind, an awesome team of engineers who are ready to ramp up any top-notch company’s projects! Our aim? To always be one step ahead. Become part of a multicultural company in constant growth with an excellent work environment certified by Great Place To Work!


Project - the aim you'll have


We're looking for a skilled Senior Backend Engineer (Python) to join our dynamic team building an AI-powered “co-intelligence” for industrial manufacturing, combining data analytics, generative AI, and interactive guidance to help reduce wasted energy and carbon footprint from large manufacturers. You will play a key role in designing and implementing the core business logic behind our user-facing applications. These applications are the daily workflow tools for plant engineers and operators, proactively assembling insights, guiding decisions, and managing complex industrial processes.

You will collaborate closely with data infrastructure engineers, AI engineers, and front- end developers to deliver complete solutions - from early prototypes to production- grade systems. As part of a small, fast-moving team, you’ll have broad ownership and the opportunity to extend your contributions across the stack, including infrastructure, data pipelines, and front-end development, based on your skills and interests.

If you enjoy working with cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced environment this opportunity is for you!


Expectations - the experience you need


  • 10+ years of professional software development experience, with at least 5 years of Python development focused on backend systems.
  • Proven experience building backend services with complex business logic - not just API wiring, but thoughtful state management, data modeling, and lifecycle orchestration.
  • Strong working knowledge of SQL; experience with relational databases (e.g. Postgres), database schema design and evolution, and designing application- layer data workflows.
  • Solid computer science fundamentals, including algorithmic thinking, data structures (graphs, queues, etc.), and design patterns.
  • Experience building RESTful APIs (and/or GraphQL) and integrating backend services with external systems.
  • Strong unit and integration testing practices, and experience integrating with CI/CD pipelines.
  • Comfortable working in a dynamic, early-stage startup environment: independent, adaptable, proactive, and able to drive work forward with minimal oversight.
  • Excellent communication skills — ability to translate requirements into technical designs, iterate with teammates, and build consensus.


Nice to have


  • Demonstrated experience contributing to open-source projects.
  • Experience building data-focused backend services to support data-driven visualizations, dashboards, and analytics applications.
  • Familiarity with containerization (Docker) and cloud deployments (GCP preferred, AWS/Azure acceptable).
  • Experience setting up scalable development processes for application backends (testing strategies, CI/CD, monitoring, observability).
  • Familiarity with data lifecycle management, data lineage, and best practices for maintaining data integrity in complex systems.
  • Experience working in Agile/Scrum development environments.
  • Full-stack development experience with modern front-end frameworks (React, Next.js, Typescript).
  • Experience with event-driven architectures or message queues (e.g., Pub/Sub).


Position – how you’ll contribute


  • Design, develop, and operate Python-based backend services and APIs to power data- driven web applications.
  • Architect and implement complex business logic and state management for applications involving event lifecycles, workflow orchestration, and intelligent data processing.
  • Integrate with our time-series data platform and AI reasoning engine to deliver proactive, interactive features to end users.
  • Own the full application feature lifecycle: from rapid prototyping to scalable production deployment, with strong testing and CI/CD practices.
  • Shape the overall architecture of application backends, collaborating with peers across data engineering, AI, infrastructure, and front-end teams.
  • Support customer pilots and implementations by developing custom data processing and analytics modules as needed.


Our offer – professional development, personal growth


  • Educational resources
  • Flexible schedule and Work From Anywhere
  • Referral Program
  • Supportive and chill atmosphere


We are accepting applications from LATAM countries.

title: Senior Full-Stack Web Software Engineer (Remote)
description:
Unilingo connects a single video to every audience, in every language, on every major platform — with no extra work. This is not some ‘one-click’ marketing fluff. With Unilingo, one upload is all it takes. We pioneered multi-language content for YouTube, putting MrBeast and other top creators into 10+ languages. Since then, we've given creators 100 billion views, $50 million in AdSense revenue, and global recognition. With 48,000+ global submissions in the pipeline, we're only getting started. We’re building the command center for digital content — a syndication network that publishes from a single upload to any platform, in any format, in any language.


What you build here will be seen in every country on Earth.


Please email your resume to:


The Role

We’re a growing team of self-motivated engineers. We put in long hours not because we have to but because we care about the impact we’re generating. We hope to do more in a week than most other teams do in a month.

We are looking for a full-stack engineer who’s excited to experience the adventure of being in an early stage startup. We hope for your time here to be the most rewarding in your career. You’ll be given a lot of responsibility and the freedom to solve problems.


Responsibilities

  • Own the problem and work with the engineers and designer to generate a solution
  • Build, test, and ship features that solves user problems
  • Look at data and talk to users to get feedback about the feature
  • Triage and fix bugs
  • Generate proposals (through meetings, docs, and Figma) to help align team on your solution if it’s a multi-person effort
  • Review PRs to ensure that you’re not siloed in your own feature and that standards are upheld


Requirements

  • 5+ years of experience with Node, React, and Typescript
  • You’re not afraid to touch all parts of code when needed — from mouse click to DB. If you specialize in back-end, you should at least be able to disable a button on the front-end. If you’re front-end, you should at least be able to cast a return type of an endpoint field from a string to an int
  • Deploy your own code. We don’t have an ops team here, so you get to own deployment as well
  • Excellent written skills (in English)
  • B2 or above spoken English proficiency


Bonus

  • Previous startup experience — having started your own or joined one before
  • Python and some experience with implementing or deploying ML models
  • Speaks a language other than English (and code)
  • Cloud functions, NoSQL DB


Why Work With Us

You’ll hopefully experience the highest growth rate of your career here. You’ll be given freedom to execute. You and the rest of the team will likely make mistakes, but that’s okay because it’s a signal that we’re going to the edge of our capabilities - which means growth. We believe that this is what a startup is all about.


You will be working closely with Jon, our CTO, and Farbod, our CEO. Jon is an ex-Meta engineer and a top creator himself in his past life with 20M+ views across YouTube and TikTok. Farbod is a serial entrepreneur with one exit and is obsessed about distributing the highest quality content for their users. He’s spent months living with creators (literally) to understand their workflows, pain points, and what they need next.


Values

  • Mission over team over self : We value distributing content to our customers globally, working hard, and having fun with our team — without ego. Everyone at the company contributes to the final product.
  • We constantly question the status quo : We don’t copy what’s been done before. We ask, “What would this look like if we started from scratch?” and we’re not afraid to break norms to do things better.
  • Work hard and smart : We put in long hours, but only on the highest-value tasks. Our goal is to grow the company — and for everyone here to grow with it.
  • We move at the speed of light to delight our users : Our ideal sprint is three to four days. Our ideal shipping cadence is daily.
  • Artifacts are greater than talking : We communicate through action. That means documents, Figma files, Slack updates, commits, PRs — whatever it takes to keep work flowing asynchronously.

title: Analista de SEO Pleno
description:
Responsabilidades:


  • Realizar auditorias de SEO técnico em sites, identificando e corrigindo problemas que impactem o ranqueamento.
  • Desenvolver e implementar estratégias de palavras-chave com base em pesquisas e análises de mercado.
  • Otimizar páginas para motores de busca, incluindo títulos, meta descrições, headings, URLs e outros elementos on-page.
  • Criar e revisar relatórios de desempenho de SEO usando ferramentas como Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush e Ahrefs.
  • Acompanhar atualizações de algoritmos e mudanças nas melhores práticas de SEO, ajustando estratégias conforme necessário.
  • Trabalhar em parceria com a equipe de conteúdo para assegurar que materiais publicados estejam alinhados com as diretrizes de SEO.
  • Revisar e aprovar entregas de conteúdo, garantindo consistência na voz e mensagem da marca.
  • Planejar e executar estratégias de link building, incluindo identificação de oportunidades de backlinks de qualidade.
  • Monitorar a concorrência e tendências de mercado para identificar oportunidades de crescimento.
  • Colaborar com a equipe de desenvolvimento para implementar melhorias técnicas no site, como velocidade de carregamento e mobile-first.
  • Identificar palavras-chave relevantes e de alto volume de busca para o negócio, utilizando ferramentas como SEMrush, Ahrefs, Google Keyword Planner e similares.
  • Criar pautas de conteúdo atraentes, relevantes e otimizadas para SEO, alinhadas com a estratégia de marketing da empresa.
  • Auxiliar em travas, impedimentos ou problemas relacionados a SEO.
  • Analisar, implementar e produzir conteúdo focado em SEO on page e off page.


Requisitos:


  • Graduação em Marketing, Comunicação, TI, ou áreas correlatas.
  • Experiência comprovada de pelo menos 3 anos na área de SEO.
  • Experiência em análise de dados e geração de relatórios (Google Analytics, Data Studio, etc.).
  • Experiência comprovada em SEO para E-commerce ou Blog


Diferenciais:


  • Experiência com plataformas de gerenciamento de conteúdo (WordPress, Magento, etc.).


Benefícios:


  • Vale alimentação/refeição, disponibilizado num cartão flexível.
  • Auxilio Home Office.
  • Plano médico e odontológico Amil para cuidar de você e sua família.
  • PLR.
  • Total pass, para garantir um estilo de vida saudável e equilibrado, para você e seus dependentes.
  • Day off no dia do seu aniversário, para celebrar seu dia especial como merece.
  • Desconto de 20% nos produtos da printi para você aproveitar.
  • Seguro de vida.

title: Executivo de Território
description:
Estamos em busca de um profissional dinâmico e motivado para integrar nossa equipe comercial. Se você é apaixonado por desafios, tem atitude de dono e busca uma carreira de sucesso, essa oportunidade é para você!


Responsabilidades:

  • Visitar entre 8 a 12 Farmácias de pequeno e médio porte da região;
  • Planejar e identificar as oportunidades de vendas, verificar, executar MPDV, dentro das rotinas do PEX (Programa de Excelência) na base de PDVs;
  • Atingir as metas de vendas estabelecidas;
  • Participar das reuniões diárias – matinal e fechamento de vendas on-line, de segunda à sexta.
  • Participar de treinamentos e eventos para atualização e desenvolvimento profissional;


Requisitos e qualificações

  • Excelente comunicação e capacidade de negociação;
  • Capacidade analítica verificar e atuar nas oportunidades;
  • Disciplina para cumprimento de rotina;
  • Disposição para trabalhos externos e viagens estaduais;
  • Carteira de motorista B;
  • Experiência Comercial Bens de consumo, Bebidas, Sorvete, Canal conveniência, setor de Adquirência (desejável);
  • Proatividade, atitude de dono e foco em resultados;
  • Desejável: Cursando Ensino Superior (Cursos prioritários: Engenharias, Economia, Física, Estatísticas, Matemática, Adm,)
  • Residir na região de Campo Grande e proximidade.


Motivos para trabalhar na Legrand:

  • A Legrand oferece uma carreira acelerada com oportunidades de aprendizado e desenvolvimento real, em uma cultura de crescimento e meritocracia;

A Legrand hoje:

  • Empresa com mais de 100 SKUs, sendo 25 produtos líderes ou vice-líderes de mercado;
  • Faturamento anual superior a R$1 bilhão, com destaque para o produto Expec, que gera R$300 milhões por ano;

História recente:

  • Nos últimos três anos e meio, a Legrand dobrou de tamanho, aumentou seu market share e subiu duas posições no ranking, agora sendo a terceira maior;
  • Quintuplicou o número de colaboradores e foi certificada no ranking GTPW de melhores empresas para trabalhar nos últimos dois anos;
  • Novo lema “Viva a Vida”, focado em criar marcas amadas pelos consumidores.

title: Backend TypeScript Engineer
description:
We are seeking a TypeScript Engineer to join the Backend Team .


We're looking for a self-motivated engineer who can independently drive work from start to finish. They will be given clear goals and expected to take ownership of breaking them down into deliverable tasks, navigating systems and collaborating across teams to get the work done effectively.


Location & Collaboration

The team is primarily based in New York and the UK , so we ask that the working hours overlap with the U.S. Eastern Time Zone until at least 2:00 PM EST .


Responsibilities:

  • Design, build, and maintain backend services supporting audio content delivery and features, publishing, and creation.
  • Own projects end-to-end, from planning through deployment and support.
  • Collaborate cross-functionally with product, design, and other engineering teams.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve issues in production as part of a low-frequency on-call rotation.


Qualifications:

  • Proficiency in TypeScript , Node.js , and GraphQL .
  • Ability to work independently with minimal guidance.
  • Strong communication and collaboration skills in a remote and distributed team environment.
  • Experience with AWS or other cloud infrastructure platforms is a plus.
  • DevOps, Terraform, or systems reliability experience is a bonus.


Your applications are welcome!

title: Arquiteto Cloud Senior - Multicloud
description:
Na Stefanini, acreditamos no potencial da colaboração e da inovação. title: Consultor SAP TRM CFM
description:
Sobre nós

A Atos é uma líder global em transformação digital, com cerca de 94.000 colaboradores e uma receita anual de aproximadamente €11 bilhões de euros. Número um na Europa em cibersegurança, nuvem e computação de alto desempenho, o Grupo oferece soluções personalizadas de ponta a ponta para todos os setores em 69 países. Pioneira em serviços e produtos de descarbonização, a Atos está comprometida com um ambiente digital seguro e descarbonizado para seus clientes. A Atos é uma SE (Societas Europaea) e está listada na Euronext Paris.


------


  • A atuação será part-time em Caxias do Sul/RS - Evetuais idas ao escritório do cliente em semanas específicas no decorrer do projeto - com os devidos reembolsos.

  • Conhecimento básico de ABAP para realizar analise de todos os Z-Objects e propor soluções já integradas ao S/4 Hana
  • Conhecimento de SAP FIORI
  • Conhecimento do conceito Clean Core
  • Conhecimento de integrações de SAP com outros sistemas
  • Experiencia em implementação de projeto, configuração e personalização de soluções conforme requisitos do negocio, modelo greenfield e brownfield
  • Conhecimento de processos de negocio


-----

Aviso de Diversidade

Entendemos a diversidade como um fator valioso. Todas as nossas oportunidades são Afirmativas para Pessoas com Deficiência.

Valorizamos a diversidade independentemente de identidade ou expressão de gênero, orientação sexual, religião, etnia, idade, deficiência, nacionalidade ou qualquer outro aspecto.


Aviso de Proteção de Dados

Os dados pessoais coletados serão utilizados exclusivamente para o processo seletivo e tratados conforme os níveis de segurança adotados pela Atos.

Caso haja alguma dúvida relacionada à proteção de dados ou qualquer aspecto envolvendo o tratamento realizado, você pode entrar em contato por meio do canal:

title: Especialista de Engenharia I
description:
A Aegea

Criada em 2010, a Aegea é líder no setor privado de saneamento básico no Brasil. Em cada município onde atua, leva mais saúde e qualidade de vida para a população, respeitando sempre o meio ambiente e a cultura local.


Programa Respeito dá o Tom

O programa nasceu com a meta de espelhar a demografia da população brasileira no quadro de funcionários da empresa.

Em 2022 a Aegea emitiu um título sustentável atrelado a metas que incluem alcançar 45% de mulheres e 27% de negros em cargos de liderança até 2030, sendo pioneira em se comprometer com meta de diversidade racial em cargos de liderança.


A Aegea tem o compromisso com a promoção de um ambiente de trabalho mais igualitário, diverso e inclusivo, e estimula o respeito e a valorização das diferenças.

Aqui, todos os candidatos qualificados serão considerados no processo seletivo, independentemente de raça, gênero, orientação sexual, religião, naturalidade, nacionalidade, deficiência, idade ou outras características.


Responsabilidades e atribuições

  • Realizar visitas regulares a estações de tratamento de água e esgoto (ETAs/ETEs) em diversas localidades, garantindo a coleta de dados e informações relevantes para diagnósticos.
  • Analisar o funcionamento das estações, identificando problemas operacionais e propondo soluções técnicas e melhorias nos processos de tratamento.
  • Coletar amostras de água e testes químicos para realizar a eficácia dos tratamentos e ajustar as dosagens químicas conforme necessário.
  • Propor e implementar ajustes nos processos operacionais das ETEs, melhorando o desempenho e a eficiência das plantas de tratamento.
  • Manter um bom relacionamento com as equipes das unidades visitadas e com os clientes, garantindo uma comunicação clara e eficiente para entender as necessidades e desafios locais.


Requisitos e qualificações

  • Superior completo em Engenharia: Civil, Ambiental, Sanitária ou Química.
  • Experiência em operação de ETAs/ETEs e realização de diagnósticos de sistemas de tratamento (ensaios de jarros, coleta de amostras, testes químicos etc.).
  • Conhecimento em dimensionamento de ETAs/ETEs.
  • Domínio do Pacote Office, especialmente Excel em nível intermediário para controle e análise de dados.
  • CNH ativa – categoria B.
  • Disponibilidade para viagens recorrentes às unidades de negócio.


Informações adicionais

  • Assistência médica;
  • Assistência odontológica;
  • Zenklub (atendimento direcionado à saúde mental e nutricional);
  • Serviço de assistência gratuito (social, jurídico e financeiro);
  • Seguro de vida;
  • Vale transporte;
  • Gympass;
  • Vale alimentação e/ou refeição;
  • Participação nos Lucros e Resultados;
  • Kit office.

title: Business Development Representative
description:
*Previous applicants need not apply*


*Interested candidates, please schedule a call with the recruiter on this link together with your updated resume.*


About the Company

Our client is seeking a motivated and self-driven, results-oriented Sales and Business Development representative to work remotely and help grow our client base. This role focuses on developing new business opportunities, building strong client relationships, and driving revenue growth. As a remote team member, you’ll have the flexibility to work from anywhere while contributing to the success of our organization.


About the Role

The ideal candidate will possess excellent communication skills, a persuasive demeanor, the ability to effectively engage prospects and close deals.


Responsibilities

1. Business Development and Lead Generation

  • Research and identify potential clients and industries to target.
  • Develop and execute outreach campaigns using email, phone calls, and social media.
  • Schedule and conduct virtual discovery meetings with prospective clients to understand their needs and present our solutions.


2. Sales Strategy and Execution

  • Develop and maintain a pipeline of qualified leads.
  • Prepare and deliver compelling sales presentations tailored to client needs.
  • Negotiate contracts and close deals to achieve sales targets.


3. Client Relationship Management:

  • Build and nurture long-term relationships with clients to foster trust and loyalty.
  • Act as the main point of contact for prospective clients during the sales process.
  • Work closely with the operations team to ensure a seamless handoff and excellent client onboarding experience.


4. Market Representation and Brand Promotion:

  • Represent firm as a trusted partner for outsourced bookkeeping and tax services.
  • Participate in virtual networking events and webinars to connect with potential clients and partners.
  • Collaborate with the marketing team to develop content and campaigns that drive engagement and brand awareness.


5. Reporting and Administration:

  • Maintain accurate records of sales activities, client interactions, and progress in the CRM system.
  • Provide regular reports on sales performance and market trends.
  • Stay up to date on industry developments to identify new opportunities.


Qualifications

  • Proven experience in sales, telemarketing, appointment setting, or a similar role. focus on professional services, accounting, or finance preferred.
  • Excellent verbal communication skills with the ability to engage and build rapport over the phone or video call.
  • Strong persuasive and negotiation skills.
  • Strong ability to research and identify opportunities, analyze market trends, and develop targeted outreach strategies.
  • Remote Work Experience: Previous success in a remote role, with the ability to manage time, priorities, and communication effectively without direct supervision.
  • Comfortable leveraging digital tools such as Slack, Zoom, and marketing automation software to optimize sales efforts.
  • CRM Proficiency: Hands-on experience using CRM software (e.g., Pipedrive, Salesforce, HubSpot, or similar) for managing leads, tracking sales activities, and analyzing performance.
  • Goal-oriented mindset with the ability to meet and exceed sales targets.
  • Self-Starter: Highly motivated and proactive, with a strong sense of ownership and accountability for results.
  • Positive attitude and self-motivated approach to work.
  • Relationship Builder: Strong interpersonal skills with a proven ability to establish trust, foster loyalty, and build long-term relationships.
  • Adaptable and Resilient: Capable of thriving in a dynamic environment and overcoming challenges with a positive attitude.
  • Time management skills and the ability to prioritize tasks effectively.
  • Willingness to learn and adapt to changing processes and strategies.


Work Type

Location: Remote

Monday – Friday 9-5 PM PST (8 hours per day)

90-day probationary period as PT (4 hours per day)


Benefits

  • Join Our Dynamic Team: Experience our fun, inclusive, innovative culture that values your unique contributions and supports your professional growth.
  • Embrace the Opportunities: Seize daily chances to learn, innovate, and excel. Make a real impact in your field.
  • Limitless Career Growth: Unlock a world of possibilities and resources to propel your career forward.
  • Fast-Paced Thrills: Thrive in a high-energy, engaging atmosphere. Embrace challenges and reap stimulating rewards.
  • Flexibility, Your Way: Embrace the freedom to work from home or any location of your choice. Create your ideal work environment.
  • Work-Life Balance at Its Best: Say goodbye to stressful commutes and hello to quality time with loved ones. Achieve a healthy work-life integration to perform at your best.
  • Ability to work independently and manage time effectively to achieve sales targets.
  • Goal-oriented and self-motivated with a drive to succeed.
  • Proficiency in using CRM software to manage leads and pipelines.
  • Existing network of potential clients is a plus.


System Requirements

  • At least 20mbps for main internet and at least 10mbps for backup
  • A desktop or laptop that has an i5 processor with at least 8 GB RAM and an i3 processor for backup
  • Note: Back-ups should still be able to function when there is a power interruption
  • A webcam
  • Noise-canceling USB Headset
  • Quiet, Dedicated Home Office


*Please note that those who meet the system requirements will be prioritized.*

title: Golang Developer SR
description:
Description


Important Information

Location: Brazil

Job Mode: Full-time

Work Mode: Work from home

Job Summary

Looking for a Senior Golang Developer who can develop features, troubleshoot, debug and fix issues.


Responsibilities and Duties

  • Understanding customer/product requirements, convert them to working code;
  • Participate in daily scrum calls with the team assign and review work products & deliverables. Independently work on your own tasks and deliverables;
  • Analyze JIRA tickets raised/assigned by Customer, or Support members, perform RCA, fix issues as per SLAs;
  • Work closely with BAs, Technical architects, onsite/offshore counterparts to deliver on customer needs/enhancements. Ability to understand feature requirements and provide feasible solutions in coordination with architects and team;
  • Work closely with the Development team in developing features and fixing bugs;
  • Participate in and provide technical details for OnCall support on weekly rotation basis (mostly during normal business hours).


Essential Skills

  • Proficient in Golang;
  • Understanding of advanced concepts of Golang;
  • Knowledge of different go frameworks like gofibre, gorilla etc;
  • Experience of REST API development;
  • Should be familiar to the docker;
  • Strong experience of MSSQL;
  • Basic cloud exposure to like azure, AWS;
  • Full SDLC cycle with large scale live roll out participation as a developer.

Highly Desirable Skills

  • Understanding Architecture and Frameworks;
  • Debugging and troubleshooting;
  • Good to have Financial/ Lending platform knowledge.

About Encora


Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.


At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Analista financeiro
description:
Hey, bora se juntar ao time Nutrição Sem Fronteiras?


Aqui, na Maior Escola de Negócios para Nutricionistas da América Latina , você terá a oportunidade de evoluir profissionalmente enquanto contribui para colocar a Nutrição no topo das profissões da saúde.

Nosso principal objetivo é empoderar o Nutricionista , por meio de conhecimentos e habilidades de negócios, sempre colocando o paciente no centro. Fazemos isso com nossa metodologia exclusiva das Consultorias Premium e do Método Check-in.

Não somos Sem Fronteiras  só no nome, ok? Acreditamos na liberdade geográfica e temos um time 100% remoto. Aqui, trabalhamos com confiança, comunicação e muita troca entre o time. Nossos valores são: Integridade Inabalável, Progresso Contínuo e Cliente no Comando .

Se você acredita nesses princípios e quer crescer em um ambiente dinâmico e desafiador, essa vaga é para você!


Responsabilidades:

  • Gerenciar o fluxo de caixa diário, semanal e mensal (cash flow forecast), garantindo previsibilidade e controle de entradas e saídas;
  • Controlar posições de caixa, aplicações financeiras e dívidas da empresa;
  • Garantir acuracidade dos saldos de caixa e apoiar a elaboração de relatórios gerenciais;
  • Monitorar e acompanhar indicadores financeiros como CAC, LTV, CHURN e oferecendo análises que apoiem a tomada de decisão estratégica;
  • Apoiar auditorias internas e externas, reunindo dados financeiros e esclarecendo informações com clareza e responsabilidade;
  • Atuar com senso analítico para propor melhorias operacionais nos processos da área;
  • Identificar oportunidades de automação e eficiência em rotinas de tesouraria;
  • Atuação com contas a pagar, incluindo conferência e programação de pagamentos;
  • Colaborar com áreas como Contábil, Fiscal, Contas a Receber e Cobrança, assegurando integração e consistência dos dados;
  • Acompanhar conciliações financeiras, movimentações bancárias e controle de tarifas;
  • Apoiar no controle e gestão de contratos financeiros, incluindo financiamentos ou parcelamentos quando aplicável;
  • Apoiar e desenvolver colaboradores mais juniores do time financeiro, disseminando boas práticas e conhecimento técnico;
  • Preparar análises financeiras sob demanda da liderança da área e da diretoria;
  • Gerar e acompanhar relatórios para controle de performance da área;
  • Participar de reuniões periódicas de alinhamento e acompanhamento de resultados.


Requisitos:

  • Experiência prévia sólida em Tesouraria e processos financeiros em geral;
  • Domínio em rotinas de contas bancárias, conciliações financeiras, aplicações e captações;
  • Habilidade analítica e visão crítica para processos e controles financeiros;
  • Excel avançado (fórmulas, tabelas dinâmicas, gráficos e cruzamento de dados);
  • Experiência com ERPs financeiros.


Diferencias:

  • Conhecimento em Looker Studio (Google) para geração e visualização de relatórios;
  • Experiência prévia em empresas de médio porte ou em expansão acelerada;
  • Histórico de participação em iniciativas de automação de rotinas ou melhoria de processos.


Modalidade de trabalho : Remoto

Remuneração : Negociável

title: Senior Internal Talent Advisor
description:
Senior Internal Talent Advisor

We are looking for a Senior Internal Talent Advisor based in Brazil to join our team in a senior-level role within Talent Acquisition. This position serves as a strategic liaison between our Client and Randstad, requiring strong stakeholder management skills, operational insight, and leadership capabilities. The ideal candidate will have a background in full-cycle recruiting or HR roles with a focus on recruitment and proven experience in client-facing roles.

Location: Brazil


Work Type: Remote


Function: Strategic recruitment operations and client engagement


Key Responsibilities:

  • Act as the primary point of contact between Google and RSR, ensuring the delivery of high-quality recruitment services.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with hiring managers and senior stakeholders, offering strategic consulting and data-driven recommendations.
  • Oversee the performance of the recruitment delivery team (the pod), ensuring all SLAs and KPIs are consistently met.
  • Analyze operational data and identify trends to proactively solve issues and drive improvements in recruiting processes.
  • Influence and guide the team toward achieving delivery goals and maintaining a high standard of client satisfaction.
  • Present insights, updates, and reports to both internal and client-side leadership in a confident and compelling manner.


Required Qualifications:

  • Minimum 5 years of experience in full-cycle recruiting or HR roles with a strong emphasis on talent acquisition.
  • Previous experience in staffing, RPO, or talent consulting firms (e.g., Randstad , Adecco, Manpower), especially in client-facing or manager-facing roles .
  • Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills , with the ability to engage with senior leadership and clients.
  • Native Portuguese, Fluent in English (Spanish is a plus).
  • Strong attention to detail, critical thinking, and a self-assured, professional presence.
  • Ability to analyze operational challenges, identify risks/opportunities, and implement strategic solutions.
  • Proven ability to lead or influence recruitment teams toward high performance and successful delivery.

title: SAP IM Consultant
description:

title: Maintenance Coordinator
description:
Position: Maintenance Coordinator (Maternity Cover – with potential for permanent employment)

Location: Guarapari, ES – Brazil


Description:

CRC Evans is a leading global expert in the provision of welding and coating services. CRC Evans provides a unique combination of welding and coating services, equipment, technologies and integrated solutions, with an unparalleled reputation for excellence that has been gained over 90 years.


The Role

We are seeking a Maintenance Coordinator to join our team in Guarapari. The ideal candidate will lead maintenance planning and engineering processes, ensuring the reliability and performance of our industrial assets. English fluency is essential due to frequent communication with international teams.


Key Responsibilities

  • Implement reliability-centered maintenance strategies (FMEA/Failure analysis)
  • Develop and execute a 52-week maintenance plan
  • Define and monitor performance indicators
  • Manage lifecycle costs of industrial assets
  • Support SAP maintenance software implementation
  • Coordinate the reception and installation of new equipment, including planning, training, and contracts
  • Adapt UK procedures to Brazilian legislation and NR standards
  • Analyze equipment failures, maintenance loss profiles, and material resource planning
  • Liaise with both local and international procurement and importation teams
  • Promote and ensure compliance with company Health, Safety & Environmental policies


Key Requirements

  • Degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering
  • Proven leadership experience
  • Solid background in industrial maintenance and asset management
  • Expertise in reliability-centered maintenance
  • Proficient with SAP ERP and Microsoft Office (Excel, Word, Power BI)
  • Strong problem-solving skills and process improvement mindset
  • Excellent teamwork and communication skills
  • Advanced English proficiency is required



Due to current workloads, we regret to inform that in the instance you have not heard from us within 2 weeks of your application, you are to consider your application unsuccessful at this time.

title: Senior Frontend (Angular) Engineer
description:
About Us

XILO , a fast-growing Vertical AI company recently backed by a Series A financing round, is seeking a highly experienced and driven Senior Frontend Engineer to elevate our Angular codebase, improve modularity, and mentor junior engineers in writing clean, maintainable front-end code.

Founded in 2019 by two best friends, Jon and Eli, XILO set out to revolutionize the insurance industry by solving its biggest challenges. Eli, a brokerage owner, brought invaluable industry expertise, while Jon, an experienced software engineer, saw an opportunity to innovate using technology. Initially launched as a vertical SaaS solution addressing core quoting challenges, XILO has since evolved into a trailblazing Vertical AI company leveraging the latest AI technology to transform the industry. By layering cutting-edge AI solutions onto its SaaS platform, XILO is driving innovation far beyond its original vision. Having recently closed our Series A funding round, XILO is growing rapidly and seeking talented individuals who want to do career-defining work in a mission-driven startup that’s at the forefront of AI innovation.


About The Role

You’ll be at the heart of shaping the user experience for thousands of insurance professionals, wrapping powerful AI-driven automation in an intuitive, efficient, and beautiful interface.

This isn’t just another frontend job. Insurance agents spend hours wrestling with outdated, clunky systems -your work will change that. We’ve seen first-hand how much frustration our automation removes, and with your help, we’ll take it even further – creating tools that don’t just work, but feel seamless, fast, and a joy to use.


We’re building with modern frontend technologies, including Angular , to ensure high performance, efficiency, and scalability. If you’re an expert in Angular’s latest features , you’ll have a unique opportunity to push the boundaries of frontend performance and UX in a data-heavy, AI-powered platform.


You’ll have the opportunity to work on:

  • Modern UI & UX for AI-Driven Automation – Designing interfaces that make complex workflows feel effortless
  • Agent-Focused Productivity Tools – Crafting dashboards and interactive tools that help agencies work faster and smarter
  • Seamless Platform Experience – Maintaining and evolving our design system to ensure a consistent, polished experience across the platform
  • AI-Powered Browser Extensions – Building extensions that bring AI Agents to life beyond APIs, automating workflows directly on carrier portals and legacy systems that don’t support direct integrations
  • Advanced PDF Processing & Rendering – Creating dynamic, interactive document management tools that handle complex insurance forms and policies seamlessly


Qualifications

  • 7+ years of frontend development experience, with a strong foundation in TypeScript and JavaScript.
  • Extensive experience with Angular (15-19), including migrating projects to newer versions.
  • Familiarity with NX monorepos to manage and scale frontend applications efficiently.
  • Optimizing build processes to improve application performance and loading times.
  • Proficient in REST API integration, including security and authentication strategies.
  • Hands-on experience developing browser extensions, extending automation beyond traditional web applications.
  • Bonus: Experience with WebSockets for real-time data updates and event-driven UI interactions.
  • Bonus: Full-stack experience with backend technologies like Node.js and Nest.js.


What we offer

  • Collaborative and innovative work environment.
  • Flex PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits), flexible work schedule.
  • Personal laptop.
  • Health and wellness package.


Why join XILO?

  • A great tech startup – Small, fast-moving, and driven by real impact
  • Endless career growth – Help shape the team, tech, and company as we scale
  • Strong leadership & backing – Work alongside experienced founders and tier 1 silicon-valley VCs

title: Líder de Serviços SAP Sênior
description:

Os Softtekians são seres humanos talentosos e auto-determinados que se consideram pessoas loucamente incríveis! Venha fazer parte desse time!!!

Sobre a Softtek:

Fundada em 1982, a Softtek é uma fornecedora global de soluções de TI orientadas a processos com 30 escritórios na América do Norte, América Latina, Europa e Ásia. Com 15 centros de entrega global nos EUA, México, China, Brasil, Argentina, Costa Rica, Espanha, Hungria e Índia, a Softtek ajuda a melhorar e produzir resultados previsíveis para corporações de primeira linha em mais de 20 países. A Softtek é a criadora e líder da indústria nearshore.

title: Application Support Specialist
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Application Support Specialist to join our dynamic team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in production support, particularly within the securities or financial services industry. This role requires excellent interpersonal skills, the ability to work effectively with global teams, and a growth mindset.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Provide comprehensive production support for our applications, ensuring their reliability and performance.
  • Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues related to application functionality.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, business analysts, and global support teams, to address and resolve issues.
  • Monitor application performance and implement improvements to enhance stability and efficiency.
  • Document support processes and maintain accurate records of issues and resolutions.
  • Participate in on-call rotations to provide 24/7 support as needed.
  • Continuously improve support practices and contribute to the development of best practices.


Must-Have Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in a related discipline or equivalent work experience required; advanced degree is beneficial.
  • 3+ years of related production support experience required; experience in the securities or financial services industry is a plus.
  • Strong interpersonal skills and proven ability to work with global teams.
  • Experience with basic scripting tools such as Python, Bash, PowerShell, Docker, etc.
  • Growth mindset and a proactive approach to problem-solving.


Preferred Qualifications:

  • Advanced proficiency in DevOps, Agile, and Lean methodologies.
  • Business knowledge of securities, fund accounting, collateral, and tri-party repo preferred but not required.
  • Experience in platform engineering, cloud, virtual environments, MQ, database management, network, ITIL, and service management.

title: FP&A Manager
description:
Open English has been a leader in online English language education for over 15 years, delivering high-quality instruction to adults and children through our digital programs. As a global EdTech company operating in 25 countries across three continents, we offer engaging, results-driven classes that help learners develop real-world language skills.

We’re seeking passionate professionals to join our innovative, collaborative team. At Open English, you’ll have the opportunity to contribute ideas, drive meaningful change, and grow within a dynamic work environment.


Position Overview:

We are seeking a Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) Manager to support the development, analysis, and reporting of the company’s key financial and operational performance indicators. This role is instrumental in delivering actionable insights and supporting data-driven decision-making across the business.

The FP&A Manager will work closely with senior management and cross-functional teams to execute budgeting, forecasting, and performance analysis processes. The ideal candidate brings strong analytical skills, business acumen, and a proactive mindset to help identify trends, challenge assumptions, and drive continuous improvement in financial planning.



Responsibilities:

Planning & Forecasting

  • Lead workstreams within the preparation of the Annual Budget and Quarterly Forecasts, owning key revenue and cost drivers.
  • Develop dynamic financial models and scenario planning to support strategic decision-making.


Provide forward-looking analysis and recommendations to anticipate business risks and opportunities.


Reporting & Performance Analysis

  • Deliver monthly and quarterly management reporting packages, including Board-level presentations.
  • Perform detailed variance analysis versus budget, forecast, and prior periods, identifying key drivers and insights.
  • Partner with business units to understand operational performance and translate it into financial outcomes.


Decision Support & Business Partnership

  • Provide financial insights and actionable recommendations to support strategic initiatives and investment decisions.
  • Manage ad hoc and prospective financial analyses to evaluate business cases, pricing, and resource allocation.
  • Communicate complex financial results to non-financial stakeholders clearly and effectively.



Process Improvement & Systems

  • Enhance budgeting, forecasting, and reporting processes through automation and best practice implementation.
  • Lead or support system improvements and integration projects involving Adaptive Insights and other planning tools.

Champion continuous improvement initiatives to increase FP&A’s strategic impact and operational efficiency.



Collaboration & Leadership

  • Collaborate cross-functionally with teams such as Accounting, Operations, Sales, and Product to align financial planning with business goals.
  • Contribute to the development of junior team members through knowledge sharing and mentorship (if applicable).


Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Business, Accounting, or a related field
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in FP&A, including managerial or team leadership responsibilities
  • Strong financial background
  • Experience with financial planning tools (e.g., Adaptive Insights, Anaplan, TM1, or similar)
  • C1 or higher level of English proficiency (written and spoken)
  • Advanced proficiency in Excel (e.g., modeling, pivot tables, lookups, macros) and PowerPoint for executive-level presentations


Desirable Requirements:

  • Experience in B2C, online subscription based business models
  • Coding experience such as Python, SQL, or related.

title: Recrutador corporativo (Inglês Fluente)
description:
Recrutador corporativo - Inglês Fluente

Oportunidade em Empresa Americana (Longo Prazo)


A Blue Dot , localizada em São Paulo, é uma empresa de BPO (Business Process Outsourcing) especializada em soluções de staffing para empresas nos Estados Unidos, oferecendo profissionais altamente qualificados para nossos clientes. Com mais de 10 anos de história, ajudamos dezenas de clientes a atender suas demandas, além de impulsionar a carreira de milhares de profissionais brasileiros no mercado norte-americano.


O que oferecemos:

  • Remuneração: R$5.000,00
  • Bônus: Em USD - Dólares.
  • Plano de crescimento: Oportunidade de crescimento para funções de gestão.
  • Estabilidade: Posição de longo prazo
  • Treinamento e capacitação: Oportunidade contínua de desenvolvimento profissional com treinamentos e certificações
  • 100% remoto.


Responsabilidades:


  • Atuar como Executive Recruiter, realizando as seguintes tarefas gerais, entre outras:
  • Colaborar com a equipe interna de recrutamento do cliente, proativamente buscando e pré-qualificando candidatos com base em requisições específicas (Medicina, Engenharia, Técnica, Construção, Jurídica, entre outras) para apresentar como candidatos ativos qualificados.
  • Gerar interesse dos candidatos por meio de estratégias criativas (e.g. email marketing, LinkedIn, postagens de vagas) para garantir um pipeline de talentos contínuo, atendendo tanto às necessidades atuais quanto ao crescimento futuro dos negócios.
  • Pré-qualificar talentos por meio de perfis, avaliando nível de interesse e tempo de disponibilidade via chamadas e emails.
  • Coordenar cronogramas de entrevistas entre clientes e candidatos em nome dos membros da equipe.
  • Manter e atualizar bancos de dados (Dynamics, LinkedIn Recruiter) com informações de candidatos ativos, desenvolvendo e atualizando descrições e especificações de vagas.
  • Identificar talentos em bancos de dados online, listas de contatos, banco de dados interno e indicações para preencher vagas rotineiras e difíceis.
  • Agendar e conduzir entrevistas para avaliar candidatos de forma independente.
  • Identificar e implementar formas inovadoras de atrair e conectar-se com um pool diversificado de candidatos.
  • Auxiliar na coordenação entre cliente e candidato em nome dos membros da equipe.


Requisitos:

  • Excelentes habilidades de comunicação em inglês (Nível fluente, tanto verbal quanto escrito).
  • Mínimo de 3 ano de experiência como Recruiter , Talent Acquisition , Hunter ou Executive Recruiter .
  • Desejo de crescer dentro de uma empresa americana, com oportunidade de assumir outras funções de liderança no futuro.
  • Procuramos por profissionais com foco em resultados, pois oferecemos oportunidade de crescimento.
  • Ser Goal Oriented
  • Resiliente

title: Consultor de seguros
description:
Sobre a Évora Seguros

A Évora Seguros é uma empresa 100% brasileira, sendo a maior corretora de seguros do segmento de concessionárias, multimarcas e revendas. Com uma história desde 1997, além do automóvel, nosso portfólio também conta com os seguros: residencial, empresarial, auto frota, pet, fiança locatícia, além dos seguros voltados a benefícios: saúde, odonto, vida e viagem, além de consórcios. Atendemos todas as necessidades em seguros para pessoas físicas e também para empresas de todos os portes e setores. Aqui na Évora todos os candidatos que atendem aos requisitos serão considerados para a vaga independentemente de raça, cor, religião, gênero, identidade, orientação sexual, nacionalidade ou idade. Candidate-se!


Responsabilidades e atribuições

-O consultor atuará dentro de concessionária de automóvel;

- Realizar a prospecção de novos clientes;

- Atualização diária de relatórios;

- Relacionamento com os gestores Comerciais das seguradoras e equipe de vendas da concessionária.


Atendimento ao Cliente:

-Identificar as necessidades dos clientes personalizando o seguro da melhor forma;

-Explicar coberturas, benefícios, assistências e condições dos seguros oferecidos;

-Prestar suporte antes, durante e após a contratação;


Vendas Consultivas:

-Oferecer produtos personalizados conforme o perfil do cliente;

-Realizar propostas e cotações de seguros (auto);

-Cumprir metas de vendas e aproveitamento.


Requisitos e qualificações

- Graduação Completa;

- Pacote Office intermediário;

- Experiência comercial nas tratativas de clientes;

- Conhecimento em Seguros e regulamentação.


Informações adicionais:

Nossos benefícios:

- Assistência Médica e Odontológica;

- Seguro de vida em grupo;

- Vale-refeição;

- Vale-transporte ou ajuda combustível;

-Salário fixo + comissão + premiação por performance;

- Desconto na contratação de seguro automóvel.

title: Estagiário (Controles Internos)
description:
Somos o maior ressegurador do Brasil. Com mais de 80 anos de experiência, atuamos nas principais linhas de negócios em resseguros e contamos com uma equipe altamente qualificada, pronta para inovar e oferecer os melhores produtos e serviços ao mercado.


Ao participar do nosso programa de estágio, você poderá conhecer a rotina de trabalho em uma empresa que é referência no setor e conta com profissionais de destaque.


Se você tem interesse em iniciar a sua vida profissional em um mercado promissor e em uma empresa sólida, se inscreva e dê o primeiro passo no desenvolvimento da sua carreira.


O que esperar do programa de estágio?


Além de uma empresa que reconhece talentos, com ambiente que estimula o desenvolvimento, oferecemos:


  • Bolsa-auxílio
  • Recesso remunerado
  • Assistência médica
  • Assistência odontológica
  • Vale-refeição e/ou vale-alimentação
  • Folga no dia do seu aniversário
  • Vale transporte


Quem esperamos?


Estudantes que acreditem no trabalho em equipe, curiosos pelo aprendizado constante e focados em seu desenvolvimento profissional. Para isso, são necessários os seguintes pré-requisitos:


  • Cursando a partir do 2° período de Ciências Atuariais, Administração, Ciências Contábeis, Ciências Econômicas
  • Previsão de formação: a partir de dezembro 2026
  • Excel avançado (conhecimento em tabela dinâmica, PROCV, elaboração e atualização de gráficos, noções intermediárias de tratamento de dados, com elaboração e atualização de dashboard)
  • PowerPoint
  • Disponibilidade para estagiar 30 horas semanais, de segunda-feira à sexta-feira


Conheça as principais atividades que você vai realizar:


  • Atualizar a planilha de Banco de Perdas Operacionais;
  • Registrar os planos de ação e as demais informações no Sistema Perinity;
  • Garantir que o Sistema Perinity esteja sempre atualizado;
  • Auxiliar na gestão das Pendências Operacionais, mantendo o dashboard atualizado;
  • Apoiar a gerência na criação e acompanhamento de indicadores de gestão da área de controles internos;
  • Suportar a gerência na elaboração de apresentações da área;
  • Auxiliar no mapeamento dos processos internos, participando das entrevistas com os gestores e interagindo com a equipe para obtenção do entendimento do processo;
  • Auxiliar no desenho de fluxogramas;
  • Participar do processo de melhoria contínua, identificando oportunidades de melhorias em processos internos e recomendando o aperfeiçoamento dos controles;
  • Apoiar na elaboração e padronização de documentos internos, tais como políticas, procedimentos, manuais e normas.


Diversidade & Inclusão


Acreditamos em um ambiente diverso, inclusivo e consideramos a diversidade para garantir que nenhum marcador de identidade nos impeça de recrutar talentos.


Conheça mais sobre nós:


  • Site institucional
  • LinkedIn
  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Glassdoor

title: Senior Software Engineer (NodeJS/Typescript)
description:
We are working on behalf of a fast-scaling payments solutions business that is rapidly expanding its engineering capabilities and currently looking to bring on board experienced Senior Software Engineers. This is a fantastic opportunity to contribute to forward-thinking and technically challenging projects within a high-growth environment.


If you're someone who enjoys solving complex problems, building scalable systems, and collaborating across teams, this could be a great next step in your career. You’ll join a vibrant and diverse engineering team focused on delivering impactful solutions using modern technologies and practices.


What You’ll Be Doing:

  • Backend Development: Design, build, and deploy scalable and maintainable backend systems within a cloud-native environment (AWS).
  • Cross-Team Collaboration: Partner with product, design, and engineering peers to shape solutions from conception to release.
  • Reliability and Monitoring: Implement observability tooling (alerts, logging, metrics), and take part in post-incident investigations to strengthen system resilience.
  • Continuous Improvement: Keep current with emerging tools and industry trends to inform best practices and maintain a future-ready tech stack.


What We’re Looking For:

  • Proven experience in backend software development, with a strong history of delivering production-quality systems.


Technical Skills we are looking for:

  • Deep knowledge of scalable architecture and design patterns.
  • Strong expertise in Node.js and TypeScript, including experience with NestJS, serverless frameworks, and AWS Lambda.
  • Experience with event-driven and microservice-based architectures.
  • Problem Solving: Excellent troubleshooting, debugging, and analytical skills.
  • Data Handling: Experience with relational databases such as PostgreSQL, MySQL, or AWS Aurora. Familiarity with ORM tools like TypeORM or Prisma is a plus.


It will be great if you have:

  • Exposure to the payments or credit card space, and/or AWS certifications.


Tech Environment:

  • Cloud: AWS (Amazon Web Services)
  • Languages: TypeScript (Node.js)
  • Frameworks: NestJS, Serverless
  • Databases: AWS Aurora (PostgreSQL / MySQL)


Why Apply?

  • Work with a global team in a remote-friendly setting
  • Be part of a rapidly expanding company with a strong tech culture
  • Contribute to innovative, meaningful projects using modern tools and architecture

title: Quality Assurance Specialist
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented Manual QA Specialist who loves uncovering issues beyond the typical user journey and strengthening the quality of complex B2B SaaS applications. This role is perfect for someone who thrives on exploring edge cases, validating intricate workflows, and ensuring a robust, enterprise-ready product.


Key Responsibilities:

✔️ Execute comprehensive manual testing of B2B SaaS web applications (multi-user workflows, account management, role-based access, data-heavy interfaces).

✔️ Design and run test cases for edge cases, boundary conditions, and unexpected user behavior to uncover hidden defects.

✔️ Develop detailed test plans and cases for new features, regression testing, and consistent system behavior.

✔️ Collaborate with Product, Development, and UX teams to align feature expectations and risk areas.

✔️ Log and manage bugs using tools like JIRA , with clear documentation and severity assessment.

✔️ Validate API integrations and backend processes using tools like Postman , ensuring data consistency and accurate business logic.

✔️ Support automation efforts (e.g., basic UI regression with Selenium, Postman scripts for API checks).

✔️ Conduct exploratory testing and lightweight performance/stress tests to ensure resilience.

✔️ Ensure cross-browser, responsive, and compatibility testing across enterprise environments.


Skills & Qualifications:

✅ 3+ years of manual QA experience testing SaaS or enterprise-grade web apps.

✅ Strong ability to design tests that go beyond the "happy path" and anticipate real-world issues.

✅ Hands-on experience with exploratory testing, boundary testing, fuzz testing, and performance edge cases.

✅ Proficiency with issue tracking and test management tools (e.g., JIRA, TestRail).

✅ Working knowledge of Postman for API testing and basic QA automation concepts.

✅ Excellent analytical skills, attention to detail, and clear documentation abilities.

✅ Comfortable working in agile, iterative development environments.


Ideal Candidate:

You love breaking things—constructively. You’re not satisfied with surface-level testing and excel at finding hidden defects that others overlook. You bring structure to QA processes and care deeply about delivering reliable, high-performance enterprise software.

title: Desenvolvedor Full Stack (Vite.js + Python)
description:
Quem somos

A Prisma Tech é uma software house e consultoria de tecnologia especializada no desenvolvimento de soluções digitais para empresas que buscam excelência técnica. Atuamos tanto em projetos de escopo fechado quanto em escopo aberto (alocação de squads), sempre com foco em entregar tecnologia de alto nível que realmente faz diferença no negócio.


Fundada por três engenheiros formados na USP, a Prisma Tech vem crescendo rapidamente e já é parceira de grandes projetos no Brasil e no exterior. Mesmo sendo uma empresa jovem, estamos em ritmo acelerado de expansão e contratando ativamente desenvolvedores para compor nosso time técnico.


Sobre a Vaga

Estamos com uma vaga para desenvolvedor Full Stack, com alocação em um projeto estratégico de uma renomada consultoria internacional .


Você será responsável pela construção do frontend utilizando React + Vite.js , além de trabalhar na integração com o backend em FastAPI (Python) .


A equipe conta com um backend já iniciado e uma squad de dados que fornecerá os cálculos e informações por meio de APIs. Esperamos autonomia para estruturar componentes, rotas, telas e lidar com integrações complexas.


Se você busca projetos de alto nível técnico , com stack moderna e um time de altíssimo nível, essa é uma excelente oportunidade.


Formato: 100% remoto

Duração inicial: 12 semanas

Dedicação: Full-time (alocação exclusiva)

Início: Imediato


Qualificações

  • Experiência sólida com React + Vite.js
  • Conhecimento em FastAPI (Python) e integração de APIs REST
  • Conhecimento de MongoDB (consulta, paginação, filtros)
  • Capacidade de atuar com boa autonomia no front , criando componentes do zero e estruturando rotas/telas


Desejável

  • Experiência com simulações, modelagens ou sistemas financeiros
  • Familiaridade com Databricks (mesmo que só para integração com API)
  • Experiência com sistemas empresariais e componentes complexos de UI


Estamos com urgência pois o projeto já começa nos próximos dias. Se você se identificou com a vaga, envie sua candidatura o quanto antes. Queremos fechar com a pessoa certa ainda nessa semana.

title: Critical Incident Manager
description:
Seu papel e responsabilidades:

1. Compreender o Incidente e as ações de diagnóstico/resolução já tentadas pelo

Service Desk e quaisquer outras Faixas de Tecnologia

2. Utilizar a ponte de comunicação designada ou alocada, as instalações de

monitoramento e a programação de plantão das Faixas de Tecnologia para

facilitar a atenção imediata de todas as partes necessárias

3. Avaliar o impacto e a urgência do Incidente, validar a prioridade dos principais

incidentes relatados

4. Iniciar chamadas de teleconferência/ponte imediatamente em incidentes graves

para envolver as faixas de tecnologia e outras partes interessadas necessárias

5. Trabalhar com todas as partes interessadas para identificar a solução alternativa

ou resolução para o Incidente

6. Definir as expectativas de todas as partes interessadas sobre os prazos e as

permissões necessárias para a resolução

7. Enviar atualizações periódicas para as partes interessadas (e, se necessário, para

os clientes) por meio do Service Desk, até que o Incidente seja resolvido

8. Iniciar Mudanças de Emergência, se necessário, mobilizar equipes

multifuncionais, Fornecedores Externos e obter aprovações para as ações de

mitigação de todas as partes interessadas

9. Manter o Posto de Observação Técnica (profissionais selecionados ad hoc que

observam o serviço após a resolução do Incidente) para garantir que a resolução

tenha realmente resolvido o Incidente e que os Serviços retornaram ao seu estado

normal

10. Documentar em retrospectiva, as ações realizadas, aprendizados e aprovações

nas ferramentas de gestão do serviço; criar planos de ação de incidentes após a

resolução de incidentes


Requisitos:

1.Disponibilidade para trabalhar em turnos para oferecer suporte a um ambiente de suporte 24 horas por dia, 7 dias por semana

2.Experiência como analista de service desk e domínio pleno dos processos e sistemas utilizados na empresa;

3.Português, inglês e espanhol avançados/fluentes (nesta posição o contato é direto com o cliente e time global).

title: [SOFTWARE ESPECIALIZADO 5] SOFTWARE ENGINEER III REACT
description:
Quem é Stone Tech?

A Stone nasceu com o propósito de ser protagonista na transformação da indústria de pagamentos, lutando para oferecer as melhores soluções para quem empreende no Brasil.

Pensando nisso, construímos a Stone Tech! A junção dos times de tecnologia Stone Co. e as empresas financeiras do grupo que reconhecem o potencial empreendedor de cada brasileiro. Por aqui, temos todas as inovações e tecnologias de ponta da Stone, Pagar.me, Ton e Vitta, com uma galera referência no mercado de tecnologia, em um ambiente descontraído, repleto de desafios, oportunidades, flexibilidade, teamplay e desenvolvimento contínuo.

Nossa cultura:

Por aqui, vivemos nossa cultura no dia a dia, guiados por esses 5 pilares:

⚡Own It: Ter espírito de dono te faz conquistar a liberdade. Valorizamos a autonomia e a proatividade, somos responsáveis pelo o que entregamos e queremos sempre evoluir o nosso negócio.

Live the Ride: Faça. Feito é melhor que perfeito. Aprendemos com os erros e encaramos desafios como oportunidades de aprendizado.

No Bullshit: Agir com simplicidade. Somos pessoas práticas, sinceras e gostamos de feedbacks. Sabemos que às vezes vamos errar e contamos com essa transparência para evoluirmos.

title: SR Fullstack Developer Node.js/Angular V.17+ (+ Electron Framework)
description:
Muito prazer, somos a Zallpy!

Somos muito mais que uma empresa de tecnologia; somos uma comunidade diversa, plural e talentosa. Nosso propósito é liderar a transformação digital, com excelência e agilidade, promovendo crescimento mútuo e genuíno em relações éticas e duradouras. Flexibilidade é uma de nossas marcas registradas, atuamos em diferentes modelos e formatos de equipe, mantendo nossa cultura leve, colaborativa e integrada, proporcionando equidade de oportunidades em um espaço onde todos se sintam seguros e ouvidos.


O que você vai fazer:


  • Desenvolver Aplicações Desktop: Crie e implemente soluções eficientes utilizando Electron Framework, integrando Node.js, TypeScript e tecnologias web, com foco em aplicações multiplataforma.
  • Colaborar em Times Ágeis: Trabalhe em uma estrutura de times ágeis, participando ativamente de trocas de informações e colaborando em um ambiente dinâmico e iterativo.
  • Participação em Cerimônias Ágeis: Contribua para a definição do backlog do produto, participe de Sprints, Dailies, Reviews e Retrospectivas, ajudando a equipe a alcançar seus objetivos.
  • Gerenciar Tarefas e Comunicações: Mantenha o quadro de tarefas atualizado, destacando o que está pendente, em andamento e identificando possíveis bloqueios. Use ferramentas de comunicação da empresa para se manter alinhado com o time.
  • Entrega de Código de Qualidade: Realize entregas de código robusto, testável e escalável, coberto por testes unitários e de integração, garantindo alta qualidade em ambiente desktop.
  • Revisão de Código: Submeta Pull Requests para revisão do time, compartilhando conhecimento e promovendo melhorias contínuas no código.


O que estamos buscando:


  • Inglês avançado ou fluente, com excelente habilidade de conversação e escrita.
  • Formação superior em Tecnologia da Informação ou áreas afins (em andamento ou concluída).
  • Experiência no desenvolvimento de aplicações utilizando Electron Framework , Node.js e TypeScript .
  • Experiência com gerenciamento de versões utilizando Git e Git Flow .
  • Sólida experiência em testes unitários e de integração utilizando Jest .
  • Experiência no desenvolvimento de aplicações desktop com alto volume de dados e processamento assíncrono.
  • Experiência na criação de APIs RESTful e uso de GraphQL .
  • Proficiente no uso de bancos de dados como MongoDB , SQL e PostgreSQL .


Será um diferencial se você:


  • Conhecimentos em Design Patterns , como SOLID e Clean Code ;
  • Experiência em ETL ;
  • Experiência em orquestração de contêineres com Kubernetes e Docker ;
  • Experiência na criação/manutenção de pipelines de CI/CD ;
  • Experiência no desenvolvimento de interfaces utilizando React.js , com foco em componentização e estilização com styled-components .


Onde você vai trabalhar:

  • Esta é uma posição para atuação 100% remota.

Modalidade de contratação:

  • CLT;

O que oferecemos:

Vale Alimentação/Refeição: Utilizamos o cartão multibenefício EVA, em formato crédito, para proporcionar flexibilidade nas suas compras diárias.*

Plano de Saúde Unimed: Sem coparticipação ou carência para o titular. Dependentes como filhos, cônjuges ou enteados podem ser incluídos com coparticipação.*

title: Representante executivo de vendas
description:

Você é apaixonado por vendas, metas e relacionamentos comerciais duradouros? A AMD Brasil Proteção Veicular , referência em soluções de proteção para veículos em todo o país, está em busca de um Executivo de Vendas para ampliar nossa presença de mercado e fortalecer nossa base de associados.

  • Alimentação de CRM e relatórios de desempenho.

Diferenciais:

  • Vivência com vendas B2C ou atendimento ao público;

O que oferecemos:

  • Comissões agressivas e premiações por desempenho;
